dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT s.shipment_gid, obrn1.ob_refnum_value loc, con.contact_xid customer, oob.order_base_xid contract_no, sref1.shipment_refnum_value commodity, loc2.city dest_city, loc2.country_code3_gid dest_country, obrn3.ob_refnum_value payment_terms, con1.first_name || ' '|| con1.last_name doc_manager, s.shipment_xid shipment_id, TO_CHAR(s.attribute_date4,'MM/DD/YY') payment_date, TRIM(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date,cv.source_location_gid) END),'dd-mm-rr'), 'Month')) || ' ' || TRIM(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date,cv.source_location_gid) END),'dd-mm-rr'))) charvoy_m_y, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date,cv.source_location_gid) END),'dd-mm-rr'), 'MM/DD/YY') charvoy_etd, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.dest_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.arrival_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.arrival_date,cv.dest_location_gid) END),'dd-mm-rr'), 'MM/DD/YY') charvoy_eta, TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1),'999990')) container_count, TRIM(st.mt_weight_numonly_formatted) weight_mt, (CASE WHEN obrn4.ob_refnum_value = 'P' THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn5.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')),2),'999,999,990.00') || ' ' || obrn6.ob_refnum_value WHEN obrn4.ob_refnum_value = 'U' THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn7.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')),2),'999,999,990.00') || ' ' || obrn8.ob_refnum_value ELSE '' END) contract_price, TO_CHAR(s.attribute_date7,'MM/DD/YY') presented_date, REPLACE(s.servprov_gid, 'SCOULAR.','') carrier, sref2.shipment_refnum_value transloader, loc1.city source_city, loc1.province_code source_state FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON srn.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || srn.shipment_refnum_value LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_base vsob ON s.shipment_gid = vsob.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON vsob.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_involved_party oip ON oob.order_base_gid = oip.order_base_gid AND oip.involved_party_qual_gid LIKE '%CUSTOMER%' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con ON oip.involved_party_contact_gid = con.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn1.order_base_gid AND obrn1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn3 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn3.order_base_gid AND obrn3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_CUST PAYTERMS' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn4 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn4.order_base_gid AND obrn4.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PRICING' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn5 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn5.order_base_gid AND obrn5.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTRACT_PRICE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn6 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn6.order_base_gid AND obrn6.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PRICE_UOM' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn7 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn7.order_base_gid AND obrn7.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.PROVISIONAL PRICE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn8 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn8.order_base_gid AND obrn8.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.PROVISIONAL PRICE UOM' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON s.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON s.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON s.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.DOCUMENT MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = con1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON sref1.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON sref2.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.TRANSLOADER LOCATION NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN VIEW_SHIPMENT_TOTALS st ON s.shipment_gid = st.shipment_gid WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND oob.order_base_xid like 'S%' AND (TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date,cv.source_location_gid) END),'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date,cv.source_location_gid) END),'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) ORDER BY TO_DATE((CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date,cv.source_location_gid) END),'dd-mm-rr') ASC
